濌濌濌

濌字的基本解释

濌
tà
堆积。
放纵豁达。
用人分不清好歹。

濌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》他合切，入合，透。］
(1)堆积，物上加物。
(2)放纵豁达。参见“濌伯”。
(3)分不清好坏。参见“濌伯”。

濌字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濌； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页655第02
【廣韻】他合切【集韻】託合切，?音嚃。積厚也。與沓通。　又黑也。一曰濌濌，無賢不肖之辨。【晉書·羊曼傳】曼任達頹縱，州里稱曼爲濌伯。

濌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
濌字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
tà
accumulation.
Indulge and open-minded.
Employers can't distinguish good from bad.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" he is close, close and thorough. ]
(1) Stacking, adding things to things.
(2) Indulgence and openness. See "Lip Bo".
(3) Cannot distinguish good from bad. See "Lip Bo".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　濌; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 655 No. 02
[Guang Yun] He cuts well [Ji Yun] Holds cuts together, and the sound is loud. Accumulate thick also. Connect with Ta.　It's dark again. One said that there is no difference between good and bad. [Book of Jin·Yangman Biography] Manrenda was sullen, and the state called Man Yibo.
